title: The Truth About SEO, AI, and Content in 2025
description: Want to know where SEO is headed in 2025? In this episode of the Duct Tape Marketing Podcast, I sit down with Bruce Clay, the "Father of SEO" and founder of BruceClay.com. With nearly three decades in search engine optimization, Bruce shares expert insights on how Google ranking, AI-generated content, and SEO strategy are evolving. Learn why quality content, usability, and brand mentions matter more than everâ€”and what businesses must do to stay ahead in an AI-driven search landscape. Today we discussed: [00:00] Opening [00:09] Introducing Bruce Clay [00:53] SEO in 1996 [04:47] The Growing Importance of SEO [11:19] How to Create Quality Content for SEO [14:50] Is Zero-Click the End of SEO?
